review: Dexamethasone Intensol (dexamethasone):Given this medication following COVID-19. Appears to aid in breathing but immediately gave me Brachycardia. My heart rate is now resting in the 50’s and going into low 40’s while trying to rest . This result in me being jerked awake gasping for air when I can actually sleep. The medication cause me to be awake for 46 hrs straight. 6mg dosage no step down.
